mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file ( parent_table, parent_no, file_name, origin_name, file_path, file_size, reg_date, upd_date, file_code ) VALUES ( #{parentTable}, #{parentNo}, #{fileName}, #{originName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{fileCode} )
